Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Establishes standards and defines the terms biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable
Summary: Establishes standards and defines the terms biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 32 §§27-3201 - 27-3211, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing standards and defining the terms biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable
